  61.  61  var namedLookup = {};
  62.  62  
  63.  63  function init() {
  64.  64   var inputColor = convertRGBToHex(tinyMCEPopup.getWindowArg('input_color')), key, value;
  65.  65  
  66.  66   tinyMCEPopup.resizeToInnerSize();
  67.  67  
  68.  68   generatePicker();
  69.  69   generateWebColors();
  70.  70   generateNamedColors();
  71.  71  
  72.  72   if (inputColor) {
  73.  73   changeFinalColor(inputColor);
  74.  74  
  75.  75   col = convertHexToRGB(inputColor);
  76.  76  
  77.  77   if (col)
  78.  78   updateLight(col.r, col.g, col.b);
  79.  79   }
  80.  80  
  81.  81   for (key in named) {
  82.  82   value = named[key];
  83.  83   namedLookup[value.replace(/\s+/, '').toLowerCase()] = key.replace(/#/, '').toLowerCase();
  84.  84   }
  85.  85  }
  86.  86  
  87.  87  function toHexColor(color) {
  88.  88   var matches, red, green, blue, toInt = parseInt;
  89.  89  
  90.  90   function hex(value) {
  91.  91   value = parseInt(value).toString(16);
  92.  92  
  93.  93   return value.length > 1 ? value : '0' + value; // Padd with leading zero
  94.  94   };
  95.  95  
  96.  96   color = color.replace(/[\s#]+/g, '').toLowerCase();
  97.  97   color = namedLookup[color] || color;
  98.  98   matches = /^rgb\((\d{1,3}),(\d{1,3}),(\d{1,3})\)|([a-f0-9]{2})([a-f0-9]{2})([a-f0-9]{2})|([a-f0-9])([a-f0-9])([a-f0-9])$/.exec(color);
  99.  99  
  100. 100   if (matches) {
  101. 101   if (matches[1]) {
  102. 102   red = toInt(matches[1]);
  103. 103   green = toInt(matches[2]);
  104. 104   blue = toInt(matches[3]);
  105. 105   } else if (matches[4]) {
  106. 106   red = toInt(matches[4], 16);
  107. 107   green = toInt(matches[5], 16);
  108. 108   blue = toInt(matches[6], 16);
  109. 109   } else if (matches[7]) {
  110. 110   red = toInt(matches[7] + matches[7], 16);
  111. 111   green = toInt(matches[8] + matches[8], 16);
  112. 112   blue = toInt(matches[9] + matches[9], 16);
  113. 113   }
  114. 114  
  115. 115   return '#' + hex(red) + hex(green) + hex(blue);
  116. 116   }
  117. 117  
  118. 118   return '';
  119. 119  }
  120. 120  
  121. 121  function insertAction() {
  122. 122   var color = document.getElementById("color").value, f = tinyMCEPopup.getWindowArg('func');
  123. 123  
  124. 124   tinyMCEPopup.restoreSelection();
  125. 125  
  126. 126   if (f)
  127. 127   f(toHexColor(color));
  128. 128  
  129. 129   tinyMCEPopup.close();
  130. 130  }
  131. 131  
  132. 132  function showColor(color, name) {
  133. 133   if (name)
  134. 134   document.getElementById("colorname").innerHTML = name;
  135. 135  
  136. 136   document.getElementById("preview").style.backgroundColor = color;
  137. 137   document.getElementById("color").value = color.toUpperCase();
  138. 138  }
  139. 139  
  140. 140  function convertRGBToHex(col) {
  141. 141   var re = new RegExp("rgb\\s*\\(\\s*([0-9]+).*,\\s*([0-9]+).*,\\s*([0-9]+).*\\)", "gi");
  142. 142  
  143. 143   if (!col)
  144. 144   return col;
  145. 145  
  146. 146   var rgb = col.replace(re, "$1,$2,$3").split(',');
  147. 147   if (rgb.length == 3) {
  148. 148   r = parseInt(rgb[0]).toString(16);
  149. 149   g = parseInt(rgb[1]).toString(16);
  150. 150   b = parseInt(rgb[2]).toString(16);
  151. 151  
  152. 152   r = r.length == 1 ? '0' + r : r;
  153. 153   g = g.length == 1 ? '0' + g : g;
  154. 154   b = b.length == 1 ? '0' + b : b;
  155. 155  
  156. 156   return "#" + r + g + b;
  157. 157   }
  158. 158  
  159. 159   return col;
  160. 160  }
  161. 161  
  162. 162  function convertHexToRGB(col) {
  163. 163   if (col.indexOf('#') != -1) {
  164. 164   col = col.replace(new RegExp('[^0-9A-F]', 'gi'), '');
  165. 165  
  166. 166   r = parseInt(col.substring(0, 2), 16);
  167. 167   g = parseInt(col.substring(2, 4), 16);
  168. 168   b = parseInt(col.substring(4, 6), 16);
  169. 169  
  170. 170   return {r : r, g : g, b : b};
  171. 171   }
  172. 172  
  173. 173   return null;
  174. 174  }
  175. 175  
  176. 176  function generatePicker() {
  177. 177   var el = document.getElementById('light'), h = '', i;
  178. 178  
  179. 179   for (i = 0; i < detail; i++){
  180. 180   h += '<div id="gs'+i+'" style="background-color:#000000; width:15px; height:3px; border-style:none; border-width:0px;"'
  181. 181   + ' onclick="changeFinalColor(this.style.backgroundColor)"'
  182. 182   + ' onmousedown="isMouseDown = true; return false;"'
  183. 183   + ' onmouseup="isMouseDown = false;"'
  184. 184   + ' onmousemove="if (isMouseDown && isMouseOver) changeFinalColor(this.style.backgroundColor); return false;"'
  185. 185   + ' onmouseover="isMouseOver = true;"'
  186. 186   + ' onmouseout="isMouseOver = false;"'
  187. 187   + '></div>';
  188. 188   }
  189. 189  
  190. 190   el.innerHTML = h;
  191. 191  }
  192. 192  
  193. 193  function generateWebColors() {
  194. 194   var el = document.getElementById('webcolors'), h = '', i;
  195. 195  
  196. 196   if (el.className == 'generated')
  197. 197   return;
  198. 198  
  199. 199   // TODO: VoiceOver doesn't seem to support legend as a label referenced by labelledby.
  200. 200   h += '<div role="listbox" aria-labelledby="webcolors_title" tabindex="0"><table role="presentation" border="0" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="0">'
  201. 201   + '<tr>';
  202. 202  
  203. 203   for (i=0; i<colors.length; i++) {
  204. 204   h += '<td bgcolor="' + colors[i] + '" width="10" height="10">'
  205. 205   + '<a href="javascript:insertAction();" role="option" tabindex="-1" aria-labelledby="web_colors_' + i + '" onfocus="showColor(\'' + colors[i] + '\');" onmouseover="showColor(\'' + colors[i] + '\');" style="display:block;width:10px;height:10px;overflow:hidden;">';
  206. 206   if (tinyMCEPopup.editor.forcedHighContrastMode) {
  207. 207   h += '<canvas class="mceColorSwatch" height="10" width="10" data-color="' + colors[i] + '"></canvas>';
  208. 208   }
  209. 209   h += '<span class="mceVoiceLabel" style="display:none;" id="web_colors_' + i + '">' + colors[i].toUpperCase() + '</span>';
  210. 210   h += '</a></td>';
  211. 211   if ((i+1) % 18 == 0)
  212. 212   h += '</tr><tr>';
  213. 213   }
  214. 214  
  215. 215   h += '</table></div>';
  216. 216  
  217. 217   el.innerHTML = h;
  218. 218   el.className = 'generated';
  219. 219  
  220. 220   paintCanvas(el);
  221. 221   enableKeyboardNavigation(el.firstChild);
  222. 222  }
  223. 223  
  224. 224  function paintCanvas(el) {
  225. 225   tinyMCEPopup.getWin().tinymce.each(tinyMCEPopup.dom.select('canvas.mceColorSwatch', el), function(canvas) {
  226. 226   var context;
  227. 227   if (canvas.getContext && (context = canvas.getContext("2d"))) {
  228. 228   context.fillStyle = canvas.getAttribute('data-color');
  229. 229   context.fillRect(0, 0, 10, 10);
  230. 230   }
  231. 231   });
  232. 232  }
  233. 233  function generateNamedColors() {
  234. 234   var el = document.getElementById('namedcolors'), h = '', n, v, i = 0;
  235. 235  
  236. 236   if (el.className == 'generated')
  237. 237   return;
  238. 238  
  239. 239   for (n in named) {
  240. 240   v = named[n];
  241. 241   h += '<a href="javascript:insertAction();" role="option" tabindex="-1" aria-labelledby="named_colors_' + i + '" onfocus="showColor(\'' + n + '\',\'' + v + '\');" onmouseover="showColor(\'' + n + '\',\'' + v + '\');" style="background-color: ' + n + '">';
  242. 242   if (tinyMCEPopup.editor.forcedHighContrastMode) {
  243. 243   h += '<canvas class="mceColorSwatch" height="10" width="10" data-color="' + colors[i] + '"></canvas>';
  244. 244   }
  245. 245   h += '<span class="mceVoiceLabel" style="display:none;" id="named_colors_' + i + '">' + v + '</span>';
  246. 246   h += '</a>';
  247. 247   i++;
  248. 248   }
  249. 249  
  250. 250   el.innerHTML = h;
  251. 251   el.className = 'generated';
  252. 252  
  253. 253   paintCanvas(el);
  254. 254   enableKeyboardNavigation(el);
  255. 255  }
  256. 256  
  257. 257  function enableKeyboardNavigation(el) {
  258. 258   tinyMCEPopup.editor.windowManager.createInstance('tinymce.ui.KeyboardNavigation', {
  259. 259   root: el,
  260. 260   items: tinyMCEPopup.dom.select('a', el)
  261. 261   }, tinyMCEPopup.dom);
  262. 262  }
  263. 263  
  264. 264  function dechex(n) {
  265. 265   return strhex.charAt(Math.floor(n / 16)) + strhex.charAt(n % 16);
  266. 266  }
  267. 267  
  268. 268  function computeColor(e) {
  269. 269   var x, y, partWidth, partDetail, imHeight, r, g, b, coef, i, finalCoef, finalR, finalG, finalB;
  270. 270  
  271. 271   x = e.offsetX ? e.offsetX : (e.target ? e.clientX - e.target.x : 0);
  272. 272   y = e.offsetY ? e.offsetY : (e.target ? e.clientY - e.target.y : 0);
  273. 273  
  274. 274   partWidth = document.getElementById('colors').width / 6;
  275. 275   partDetail = detail / 2;
  276. 276   imHeight = document.getElementById('colors').height;
  277. 277  
  278. 278   r = (x >= 0)*(x < partWidth)*255 + (x >= partWidth)*(x < 2*partWidth)*(2*255 - x * 255 / partWidth) + (x >= 4*partWidth)*(x < 5*partWidth)*(-4*255 + x * 255 / partWidth) + (x >= 5*partWidth)*(x < 6*partWidth)*255;
  279. 279   g = (x >= 0)*(x < partWidth)*(x * 255 / partWidth) + (x >= partWidth)*(x < 3*partWidth)*255 + (x >= 3*partWidth)*(x < 4*partWidth)*(4*255 - x * 255 / partWidth);
  280. 280   b = (x >= 2*partWidth)*(x < 3*partWidth)*(-2*255 + x * 255 / partWidth) + (x >= 3*partWidth)*(x < 5*partWidth)*255 + (x >= 5*partWidth)*(x < 6*partWidth)*(6*255 - x * 255 / partWidth);
  281. 281  
  282. 282   coef = (imHeight - y) / imHeight;
  283. 283   r = 128 + (r - 128) * coef;
  284. 284   g = 128 + (g - 128) * coef;
  285. 285   b = 128 + (b - 128) * coef;
  286. 286  
  287. 287   changeFinalColor('#' + dechex(r) + dechex(g) + dechex(b));
  288. 288   updateLight(r, g, b);
  289. 289  }
  290. 290  
  291. 291  function updateLight(r, g, b) {
  292. 292   var i, partDetail = detail / 2, finalCoef, finalR, finalG, finalB, color;
  293. 293  
  294. 294   for (i=0; i<detail; i++) {
  295. 295   if ((i>=0) && (i<partDetail)) {
  296. 296   finalCoef = i / partDetail;
  297. 297   finalR = dechex(255 - (255 - r) * finalCoef);
  298. 298   finalG = dechex(255 - (255 - g) * finalCoef);
  299. 299   finalB = dechex(255 - (255 - b) * finalCoef);
  300. 300   } else {
  301. 301   finalCoef = 2 - i / partDetail;
  302. 302   finalR = dechex(r * finalCoef);
  303. 303   finalG = dechex(g * finalCoef);
  304. 304   finalB = dechex(b * finalCoef);
  305. 305   }
  306. 306  
  307. 307   color = finalR + finalG + finalB;
  308. 308  
  309. 309   setCol('gs' + i, '#'+color);
  310. 310   }
  311. 311  }
  312. 312  
  313. 313  function changeFinalColor(color) {
  314. 314   if (color.indexOf('#') == -1)
  315. 315   color = convertRGBToHex(color);
  316. 316  
  317. 317   setCol('preview', color);
  318. 318   document.getElementById('color').value = color;
  319. 319  }
  320. 320  
  321. 321  function setCol(e, c) {
  322. 322   try {
  323. 323   document.getElementById(e).style.backgroundColor = c;
  324. 324   } catch (ex) {
  325. 325   // Ignore IE warning
  326. 326   }
  327. 327  }
  328. 328  
  329. 329  tinyMCEPopup.onInit.add(init);
